# Phase 2 Audit Remediation Complete

## What Was Done

### Task #8: Exception Hierarchy
- Created `HDLToolsError` base class in `hdltools/__init__.py`
- Updated 13 exception classes across 12 files to inherit from `HDLToolsError`
- All project-specific exceptions now catchable via `except HDLToolsError`

### Task #9: Layering Violation Fix
- Moved `hdllib.patterns` and `hdllib.fsm` imports in `abshdl/highlvl.py` from module-level to lazy imports inside `visit_FunctionDef`
- Eliminates architectural layering violation (base layer importing from higher layer)

### Task #10: Missing Codegen Method
- Added `gen_HDLStringConstant` to Verilog codegen (was only in VHDL)

### Task #11: Codegen Consolidation
- Moved `gen_HDLStringConstant` implementation to base class `HDLCodeGenerator`
- Removed duplicate implementations from both Verilog and VHDL backends
- Analysis showed this was the only truly identical method across backends

## Files Changed (15)
- `hdltools/__init__.py` - HDLToolsError base class (from Phase 1)
- `hdltools/abshdl/codegen.py` - gen_HDLStringConstant implementation
- `hdltools/abshdl/generator.py` - HDLEntityGeneratorError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/abshdl/highlvl.py` - PatternNotAllowedError + lazy imports
- `hdltools/abshdl/interface.py` - HDLModuleInterfaceError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/abshdl/module.py` - HDLModuleError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/hdllib/fsm.py` - FSMInputError, FSMInvalidStateError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/mmap/builder.py` - MMBuilderSemanticError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/patterns/__init__.py` - PatternError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/patterns/matcher.py` - PatternMatcherError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/sim/hdl.py` - IllegalCodeError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/tools/common/mmap.py` - MmapError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/vcd/parser.py` - VCDParserError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/vcd/trigger/__init__.py` - VCDTriggerError → HDLToolsError
- `hdltools/verilog/codegen.py` - removed duplicate gen_HDLStringConstant
- `hdltools/vhdl/codegen.py` - removed duplicate gen_HDLStringConstant

## Test Results
122 passed, 3 skipped, 0 failed

data.title: Phase 2 Audit Remediation Complete
